tool_description: This FREE API has two features. First feature is, "Given City and State (2 char state code), it will get all zipcodes for it". And second feature is "Given zipcode, then it will get city & state for it". It also provides other details like type of zipcode (PO Box or standard or unique). It provides latitude & longitude of zipcode center.
name: Get Detailed zip code from city state OR detailed zipcode report.
title: Get Detailed zip code from city state OR detailed zipcode report.
tool_name: Get Detailed zip code from city state OR detailed zipcode report.

api_list.name: /zipInfo
api_list.description: This FREE API has two features. First feature is, "Given City and State (2 char state code), it will get all zipcodes for it". And second feature is "Given zipcode, then it will get city & state for it". It also provides other details like type of zipcode (PO Box or standard or unique). It provides latitude & longitude of zipcode center.

optional_parameters.name: zipcode
optional_parameters.description: 5 Digit zipcode. If entered, then it will get details of this zipcode.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: If zipcode is not present but city & state present, then it will lookup zipcode for it.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: If zipcode is not present but city & state present, then it will lookup zipcode for it.

optional_parameters.name: request_id
optional_parameters.description: Send unique Request Id. It is returned as part of response.
